  • Exception Summary
    Exception
    Description
    ApiRequestException
     
    AuthenticationException
    Thrown whenever there is an error in the authentication process
    AuthorizationException
    Thrown whenever a client tries to access a resource that he doesn't have access
    ConflictException
    Thrown whenever there is a conflict with what the user want to do with de DB and the state of the DB Ex: a wrong FK has been specified the transaction amount is greater than the account amount
    LittleBoyException
    The server is nuked Used for cases that are not supposed to happen during runtime
    MissingParamException
    When the incoming request has missing parameters
    ResourceNotFound
    When the user want to access data that is not on the DB
    UnimplementedException
    The end point is not yet implemented only for dev purposes
    UserAlreadyExist
    When a user or a bank tries to create an account that already exists
